import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' export default function Step1(){ const { register, handleSubmit, watch, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const nav=useNavigate(); const[value,setValue]=useState({firstName:'',lastName:''}) const handleChange=(e)=>{ setValue({...value,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) console.log(e.target) } const onClick=()=>{ nav('/step2') } return(
handleChange(e)})} /> handleChange(e)})} /> handleChange(e)})} /> handleChange(e)})} /> handleChange(e)})} /> handleChange(e)})} />
